Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Makhado_Coal_Mine. The Makhado Coal Project is located in Mudimeli, Vhembe, Limpopo, South Africa. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/Makhado_Coal_Mine. The Makhado Coal Project is located in the Soutpansberg coalfield, approximately 36 km north of the town of Makhado

owners: Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa
web_search_companies.notes: MC Mining holds a 67.3% interest in the project through its subsidiary Baobab Mining & Exploration.
